item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:92 Chances: CNHI (CNH Industrial NV) operates in the agriculture and construction industries, which are essential sectors for economic development and infrastructure growth. The company offers a diverse range of specialized machines and services for farming and construction, making it well-positioned to benefit from global infrastructure and agriculture development projects.
